# Guardian of  
Your Digital Assets

## We are a fully-licensed and insured digital asset custodian that provides
secure, institutional-grade, proprietary, integrated custodial blockchain
solutions.

Learn More

Why Choose Aegis?

Built with user-friendliness and flexibility in mind, we provide user-centric
custody experience that can be customised based on clients’ needs leveraging
our hybrid and hardware custody solutions. The combination of our custody
solutions’ flexibility and security makes Aegis a robust and reliable
custodial partner.

Regulation

Custody solutions with built-in regulatory requirements

Coverage

4,000+ token coverage and robust staking pipeline

Fast Response

Committed to 24/7 support and 1hr turn around operation

Flexibility

Customizable configurations based on clients' requests

Services

Institutional-grade, comprehensive custodial services catering all your
regulatory needs.

Custody

Coverage of 4K+ cryptos including a wide range of native coins, stablecoins,
NFTs and blockchain-based tokens

Staking & Liquid Staking

Seamless, effortless staking through our platform without the need to compile
codes and run scripts

DeFi Governance

Regulated custodian governing your DeFi protocols through multisig approval
mechanism

Wallet Integration

API controllable wallet management system ready to be integrated with your
platform/product

NFT Marketplace

Fully customizable white label solution for building a custodial NFT
marketplace

Fiat ↔︎ Crypto

OTC and automated fiat on/off ramping services under a custodial structure

Asset Digitization

Digital certificate creations representing your assets and acting as proof of
ownership recorded on the blockchain

KYC & AML

KYC and AML screenings on received data to comply with regulatory requirements

Your assets are safe with Aegis.

###### Begin your custodial journey by speaking with our experts!

Get Started

An Exclusive Offer for Women in Crypto!

###### Empower your business with FREE custody services!

Aegis Custody is committed to promoting gender diversity in the crypto
industry. That‘s why we‘re proud to launch a new initiative exclusively for
female-founded or led crypto companies!

We‘re offering six months of free custody services, regardless of the size or
stage of development of your company.

As a licensed and qualified custodian, Aegis Custody offers secure and
compliant solutions for on-chain transactions. Protect your assets with our
industry-leading technology and join us in creating a more inclusive and
equitable crypto ecosystem.

Apply below to receive at least $28,000 worth of protection for your crypto
and take advantage of this unique opportunity to help your business thrive.
